```{r}
data <- read_csv("SAT_School_Participation_and_Performance__2012-2013.csv")
```

```{r}
data <- data %>% select(-1, -6, -9, -12) %>% rename(district = "District", school = "School", t_takes2012 = "Test-takers: 2012", t_takes2013 = "Test-takers: 2013", part_rate2012 = "Participation Rate (estimate): 2012", part_rate2013 = "Participation Rate (estimate): 2013", perc_mb2012 = "Percent Meeting Benchmark: 2012", perc_mb2013 = "Percent Meeting Benchmark: 2013")
data <- data %>% dplyr::filter(!(is.na(t_takes2012) | is.na(t_takes2013) | is.na(part_rate2012) | is.na(part_rate2013) | is.na(perc_mb2012) | is.na(perc_mb2013)))
data
```
